channel.title: CVE Feed for Bkav Corporation -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-2760|2024-08-01T19:25:41.317Z -- bkav%20corporation -- bkav%20home
item.description: Bkav Home v7816, build 2403161130 is vulnerable to a Memory Information Leak vulnerability by triggering the 0x222240 IOCTL code of the BkavSDFlt.sys driver.
